name: Lucid Realms
description:
Lucid Realms consists of levels that combine 2 realms of dream and nightmare.
Environments dynamically change as players move from one to the other.
The story begins with the main character falling asleep. During the sleep, a mysterious
character informs the protagonist about the need to wake up. The journey ends when the
protagonist wakes up.
Elements of the mechanics are jumping, attacking, moving and the most exciting one is
the transition from a dream to a nightmare realm, where the player gradually loses sanity. Sanity
plays an important role when fighting enemies.
